title: Disney Dumbo Cinestory Comic
description: Meet Dumbo, Mrs. Jumbo's sweet little "Baby Mine" who charms all who see him until it's discovered that he has huge, floppy ears! With the support of his very best friend, Timothy the mouse, Dumbo soon learns that his spectacular ears make him unique and special, allowing him to soar to fame as the world's only flying elephant. Disney Dumbo Cinestory Comic is a vibrant comic adaptation of the classic film using images from the film and the original dialogue that readers will love to rediscover on the eve of Tim Burton's live action movie!
author: Walt Disney Company
